io.werval.spi.dev

Interface DevShellSPI.SourceWatcher

  • Enclosing interface:
    DevShellSPI 

    public static interface DevShellSPI.SourceWatcher
    File watching abstraction.

    Allow DevShell implementations to choose their file watching implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DevShellSPI.SourceWatch watch(Set<File> filesAndDirectories, DevShellSPI.SourceChangeListener listener)
      Watch a set of directories.

    • Method Detail

      • watch

        DevShellSPI.SourceWatch watch(Set<File> filesAndDirectories,
                              DevShellSPI.SourceChangeListener listener)
        Watch a set of directories.
        Parameters:
        filesAndDirectories - Set of files and directories to watch
        listener - Listener to notify on change
        Returns:
        A handle to unwatch when done
